dc_title_s: Sauer's map of the city of Detroit and environs Michigan: a general map of Detroit and suburbs including the entire metropolitan area wihtin a radius of fourteen miles from the city hall, showing all highways steam and electric railways ...
dc_description_s: Compiled and drawn by Wm. Sauer. |Insets: Map of interurban car lines -- Downtown location map -- Belle Isle Park. Title from cover. Street index on verso. 1 map: col.; 69 x 102 cm.
